alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 7:41PM PST until February 25 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Up to 1 foot of snow accumulation between 1,000 feet and 4,000 feet and 1 to 2 feet of snow accumulation above 4,000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From 7 PM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Saturday. Snowfall will occur in two different waves with a brief break between systems. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
